@_Shaudix_ Hi, there! I‚Äôm not within the people ops team so am unable to help but I think my guidelines are pretty universal for most jobs so should be helpful!
@newelement_io @MessariCrypto We understand that we might not be a good fit for everyone and 100 percent support those that feel DAOs are a better fit for them!

(6/6) That's my formula for success! Think you are the perfect fit? Apply today! 
https://t.co/jvQf7cojB3

(5/6) Leave work samples if you can! 

I love seeing writing samples and other pieces that showcase the kind of work you have done in the past. These are not required but stand out when I've vetted dozens of applications at the same time.

(4/6) Avoid applying for multiple roles with us.

I see this quite often. If I see you have applied for multiple roles that are not in a relatable competency, I typically don't move forward. I want to know you are focused on marketing and comms, not just getting a job in crypto.

(3/6) Submit a cover letter. 

A resume is typically not enough for me to differentiate between one applicant and another. Tell me why you want to join my team!

(2/6) To begin...READ THE JOB DESCRIPTION. 

I can not tell you how many people apply for these more specialized roles that have never done them before. Please make sure you have done the job before as these are not entry-level.

(1/6) @MessariCrypto's marketing team is growing! New roles have just dropped for....

(4/4) Jobs in the crypto space are highly competitive these days. Take the time to showcase your amazing skills and get noticed! 

Think you are the ideal community manager for one of the best teams in crypto? Apply here: https://t.co/1fyjyk6nkn

(3/3)‚ú®Send me your social channels. The best way for me to see how you think about communicating digitally is by showcasing the channels you interact with. 

Candidates are not required to have social followings, but it is helpful for us to see how you understand these channels

(2/3) ‚ú®Write a cover letter. Cover letters are a key way I differentiate our candidates. Tell me:

+ why you are excited to join Messari
+ about your community experience
+ about your social media experience
+ what you know about crypto and how you keep up with trends

(1/3) Wowza, we are pumped with the applicants we are getting for @MessariCrypto's Community Manager role. 

Want to learn more about how you can crush this application process? Follow these tips ‚§µÔ∏è
